text: James (Ping) Alfred Williams (May 7, 1915 – September 3, 1987) was a Canadian curler. He was the third of the 1953 Brier Champion team (skipped by Ab Gowanlock),http://www.curling.ca/2017brier/past- champions/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CF9lSdS3r0E representing Manitoba. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CF9lSdS3r0E ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1915 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:People from Dauphin, Manitoba Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Jim Williams (curler)
